content.html:
A bold move, to fire key developers who understand Twitter’s codebase and speak truth to your power. Elon is the most incompetent and toxic manager of any software-intensive system than I have ever seen (and in my many years of experience I have seen quite a few).
twitter.com/elonmusk/statu…
content.value:
A bold move, to fire key developers who understand Twitter’s codebase and speak truth to your power.

Elon is the most incompetent and toxic manager of any software-intensive system than I have ever seen (and in my many years of experience I have seen quite a few).
